response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value to us and is worth $1,200,000 to you. After careful consideration, we have decided to offer it to you at a special price of $1,150,000. This is an exclusive opportunity to acquire a piece that could potentially be worth even more in the future. We believe this price reflects the exceptional quality and benefits of our product while providing you with a significant advantage. We look forward to hearing your response soon. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact us.", "product_price": 1150000}
